title: Emulate Human Vision in Applications with the OpenVINOâ„¢ toolkit | Intel Software

json.text: [MUSIC PLAYING]

We live in a world
where a picture
is worth a thousand words.

Or, if you're a developer,
it's worth a ton of data.

Visual information is something
humans take for granted.

And for computers, the gift of
sight with visual recognition

and understanding is opening
up exciting opportunities,

new usages, and advanced
capabilities, even at the edge.

Now, developers
and data scientists

can build smart video and
vision solutions more easily.

It's no longer the domain
of a few select experts.

The open visual inference and
neural network optimization

Toolkit or OpenVINO
helps developers

build high-performance
computer vision applications,

with deep learning
inference that

fuel artificial intelligence,
from edge to cloud.

Easily develop solutions that
achieve great performance

across Intel processors
and accelerators.

Use the Toolkit to
optimize applications
for numerous usages--

digital surveillance, retail,
manufacturing, smart cities,

health care, office automation,
transportation, and much more.

Optimizations with
the OpenVINO Toolkit

can increase deep learning
workload performance

up to 19 times higher,
using Intel computer vision

accelerators, compared to
public deep learning models.
So what tools are inside?

The OpenVINO Toolkit includes
the Intel deep learning

deployment toolkit, with a
model optimizer and inference

engine, that help
integrate high performance,
deep learning inference.

Save significant
time and resources

with the included pre-trained
models and code samples.

You can also be confident
with your deployment,

as the OpenVINO Toolkit
was tested and validated

on more than 100 public
and custom models.

Plus, you'll save time building
key application features

with computer vision libraries,
including optimized OpenCV.

A vast assortment of code
samples helps you get started.

The OpenVINO Toolkit
also includes other tools

and capabilities, so you
can build new features

into your application, gain
even greater performance,

or even optimize for
certain hardware.

It's easy to get up to speed
with the OpenVINO Toolkit.

Check out all free webinars,
how-tos, quick tips, and more
at techdecoded.intel.io.

Empower your applications
with new levels
of visual intelligence.

Download the OpenVINO
Toolkit for free today.
